comment:
* Abstract Base class for provider service to implement generation of Advertising Id and * limitAdTracking value. * *

The implementor of this service needs to override the onGetAdId method and provide a * device-level unique advertising Id and limitAdTracking value on that device. * * @hide

variables.name: SERVICE_INTERFACE
variables.comment: The intent that the service must respond to. Add it to the intent filter of the service.

methods.name: public abstract AdId onGetAdId(int clientUid, @NonNull String clientPackageName) throws IOException
methods.comment:
* Abstract method which will be overridden by provider to provide the adId. For multi-user,
     * multi-profiles on-device scenarios, separate instance of service per user is expected to
     * implement this method.

methods.name: public final IBinder onBind(@Nullable Intent intent)

methodNames: public abstract AdId onGetAdId(int clientUid, @NonNull String clientPackageName) throws IOException
public final IBinder onBind(@Nullable Intent intent)
